org.jdrupes.httpcodec

Class HttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdrupes.httpcodec.internal.MessageHeader

  • public class HttpRequest
extends MessageHeader
    Represents an HTTP request.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

        httpProtocol - the HTTP protocol version

      • getResponse

        public HttpResponse getResponse()
        Returns the prepared response. Upon creation, the request provides a preliminary HttpResponse that is already initialized with the basic information that can be derived from the request (e.g. by default the HTTP version is copied). The status code of the preliminary response is 501 "Not implemented".

        Although not required, users of the API are encouraged to modify this prepared request and use it when encoding the response.

        Returns:
        the prepared response
